items.sentence: You ought to tell Tom that you're planning on staying.
The cold weather slowed the growth of the rice plants.
My mother comes to stay with us at least once a month.
My mother bought my younger brother a yellow umbrella.
Why would I want to be friends with someone like that?
Why don't you give me a call next time you're in town?
Tom was scared of Mary, but Mary wasn't scared of him.
Tom is living in the apartment that I used to live in.
Tom has been driving us everywhere that we want to go.
Swimming is one thing that both Tom and I are good at.
